meanings.sent1: The movie star wore a superchic dress to the award show.
meanings.sent2: Her superchic outfit turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked superchic in its tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline at night was a superchic display of lights.
meanings.sent5: The superchic car gleamed under the bright sun.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is very stylish or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the superchic of the school for her trendy outfits.
meanings.sent2: The boutique featured a display of superchics in the window.
meanings.sent3: The superchic at the party had everyone asking for fashion tips.
meanings.sent4: The vintage car was a superchic among the classic car enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The superchic of the group always knew the latest fashion trends.
